name: Hectic Harvest (Torban)
description:
Made in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 52 Game Jam. Check out the entry here: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/52/hectic-harvest

Try to get a high score in this mayhem cross between Stardew Valley and Overcooked!

How to play:

WASD / Arrow keys = Move

Left Click = Pickup or use held item

Right Click = Drop or throw held item

Pay attention to the orders coming in. Use the right tool for the right job!

Plant and harvest the matching crop and turn it in for $$$.

At the end of the day you can cash in your crop and spend your hard earned cash at the upgrade store.

Miss 3 orders and you're fired!
